website_summaries.verdict: Despite a couple of limitations, the Sony Move Racing Wheel performs well, delivering a good sense of steering a car in racing games, and is much easier to set up than a full racing wheel.
pros: Easy to set up, the Sony PlayStation Move Racing Wheel delivers precision steering in racing games
The handles fold out, turning the wheel into motorcycle handlebars
cons: You must have the Move motion controller system to use the Move Racing Wheel
You can't charge the Move baton without removing it from the wheel

customer_reviews.title: These are a lot of fun at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cheap alternative to expensive racing wheels. Obviously it is not the same stellar experience, but still a heck of a lot better than a basic Dualshock alone. We bought 2 and they work great with our PS3 motion controllers. If playing Gran Turismo (and potentially other games), you need to set your motion controller to 1 & 2 before launching the game. I ended up changing the button associations quite a bit as well. The paddles WILL work.. I believe they need to be remapped to L1/L2 or L2/R2 (Had to Google it and am not in front of the console to verify)
customer_reviews.author: Captain Reynolds

customer_reviews.text: I can't blame this vendor for being in Quebec Canada, nor for selling a product that probably works okay, but I paid $48 (with shipping) to buy two of these Sony MOVE racing wheels, which I could not use since I couldn't calibrate two Sony MOVE wands, and I wound up paying $43 to return them, unopened, to Canada. Plus the vendor will deduct the original shipping charges from my refund, as he has a right to do, so I will wind up paying over $50 for absolutely nothing! Nobody's fault I guess, except Sony for making faulty MOVE wands and software, but it's the last time I buy from a foreign vendor through Amazon, nor any Sony MOVE products.

product_meta.title: PlayStation Move Racing Wheel
product_meta.description: Whether you're on a sports bike or in a high-octane supercar, the PlayStation Move racing wheel delivers the most intuitive, fun racing experience for screaming around corners and tearing up the track. Feel the adrenaline of high-speed racing as you jump into the driver's seat with the PlayStation Move racing wheel. Feel intense vibration feedback of vehicle as you trade paint with competition
feature_bullets: Insanely intuitive, fantastically fun racing experience
Folding handlebars allow for multiple racing modes
Realistic racing controls with paddle shifters and motorcycle-style throttle
Precise motion tracking for responsive handling of vehicle
Innovative folding grip design will allow switching between racing a sports bike to high-octane supercar
